items.name: Declan Xav
items.title: Producer
items.quote: Working with Minh and the team was a great experience they were always responsive whenever I needed their assistance. He is happy to talk you through stuff you may not understand as a budding filmmaker and make the project the best it can be!

items.name: Tom Simin
items.title: Lead Actor, Co-Producer
items.quote: It was great to work with Luna Pictures. Very responsive and professional. We were really happy with the result. Looking forward to work with them again.

items.name: Holly Andrews
items.title: Director
items.quote: Luna Pictures consistently brings my visions to life in ways I never imagined. Their collaborative spirit, especially when I have very specific ideas, is something I truly appreciate. I'm a huge fan and will definitely keep working with them.

items.name: Harvey Abrahams
items.title: VFX Supervisor
